file_content.text: I thought this was a party to celebrate the empress. I wasn't aware of any... special guests.
The shock collars are a little unsettling, but traitors deserve it! Praise Empress Vaylin!
Yes... Yes, of course... Praise Empress Vaylin!
Traitor, fetch me another drink.
Have you seen that creature in the fighting pit? Ghastly!
What excitement! The empress really knows how to throw a party.
I can't imagine how she'll top this next year.
Isn't it delightful? I'd love to take a holo with it.
Oh, that's a splendid idea! Do you think they'd let us?
Arron, it's me, Nalia! We were neighbors for three years.
You must be mistaking me for someone else.
But, Arron...
I don't associate with traitors. Now, about that drink?
No ticket? No entry. Period.
Where's your supervisor? I will not be treated like this!
You didn't tell me there would be HoloNet drones at the party.
Become a Knight of Zakuul, I thought... Live a life of glory and intrigue...
Isn't it wonderful? Our faces will be broadcast all over Zakuul!
We'll be the talk of the Spire! How's my hair?
Did you see Vaylin's last holo broadcast? Such power, such elegance.
It gave me shivers! Even her hostages seemed impressed.
Wrong again, droid. This food isn't fit for a starving dog. Make another!
I have already prepared nineteen batches.
That's it for the food deliveries.
Indo's going all out this time. I counted four hundred bottles of Zakuulan wine.
Three ninety-eight. I nabbed a couple bottles for us. Wrote 'em up as breakage.
And every one was a culinary abomination! Empress Vaylin deserves perfection, not excuses.
I taught you well.
Ugh. I don't know what Vaylin feeds her beasties, but they sure give off a ripe stench.
Do what I do. Stop breathin' through your nose.
If you think I'm sucking this nastiness into my mouth, you've got another thing coming.
What do you think's happening every time you talk?
I hate you.
The glazed kell is done.
Many years ago, the Eternal Empire sent sleeper agents into the Core Worlds.
To spy on the lowly outlands!
Precisely. The most successful of these agents was code-named Watcher Izax.
He was a strong, loyal son of Zakuul. Until the day he abandoned his homeland.
Poor fool got homesick?
No. He was stronger than you'll ever be, but still he turned his back on us. Such are the temptations of the outlands.
What'd I say, Bev? Tell me what I said.
"Keep the kids healthy."
Keep the kids healthy! But look at my kid over there. She look healthy to you?
No.
You're useless, Bev. Now give her the medicine, or I'll feed her you instead.
But she won't eat it. Maybe if I put the medicine in her food?
How about this lockdown?
Don't get me started. I need to give a blood sample just to use the bathroom.
I've got foreman's access, and I'm not doing much better.
I get it. You're a foreman.
Just saying, no one's got it easy.
